title: 가정법 도치 고급
description: Had I, Were I to, Should it 등 고급 가정법 도치를 공식적 맥락에서 활용합니다. CONDITIONAL-INVERSION-ADVANCED 패턴을 연습합니다.
examples: Had we not invested in R&D, we would have fallen behind.
Were I to make that decision again, I would choose differently.
Should it be necessary, we will allocate more resources.
learning_points: 격식 있는 조건문과 도치구조의 전문적 활용

sentences.kr: R&D에 투자하지 않았다면 우리는 뒤처졌을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had we not invested in R&D, we would have fallen behind.

sentences.kr: 그 결정을 다시 내린다면 다르게 선택하겠습니다.
sentences.en: Were I to make that decision again, I would choose differently.
Should it be necessary, we will allocate more resources.

sentences.kr: 그 정보를 미리 알았더라면 다른 접근 방식을 택했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had I known that information earlier, I would have taken a different approach.

sentences.kr: 시장 상황이 악화된다면 즉시 대응 계획을 실행하겠습니다.
sentences.en: Were the market conditions to deteriorate, we would implement contingency plans immediately.

sentences.kr: 문제가 발생한다면 저희에게 즉시 연락하시기 바랍니다.
sentences.en: Should any problems arise, please contact us immediately.

sentences.kr: 더 많은 데이터가 있었다면 더 정확한 분석이 가능했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had we had more data, more accurate analysis would have been possible.

sentences.kr: 예산이 승인된다면 프로젝트를 다음 달에 시작할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Were the budget to be approved, we could start the project next month.
